Uses of Interface
org.hibernate.LobHelper

  • Packages that use LobHelper 
    Package Description
    org.hibernate
    This package defines the central Hibernate APIs, beginning with SessionFactory, which represents an instance of Hibernate at runtime and is the source of new instances of Session and StatelessSession, the most important APIs exposing persistence-related operations for entities.
    org.hibernate.engine.spi
    This package defines some central internal SPI abstractions used throughout the implementation of Hibernate.
    org.hibernate.internal
    An internal package containing implementations of central Hibernate APIs, mostly defined in org.hibernate.

    • Uses of LobHelper in org.hibernate

      Methods in org.hibernate that return LobHelper 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      LobHelper Session.getLobHelper()
      Obtain a factory for instances of Blob and Clob.

    • Uses of LobHelper in org.hibernate.engine.spi

      Methods in org.hibernate.engine.spi that return LobHelper 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      LobHelper SessionDelegatorBaseImpl.getLobHelper()  
      LobHelper SessionLazyDelegator.getLobHelper()  

    • Uses of LobHelper in org.hibernate.internal

      Methods in org.hibernate.internal that return LobHelper 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      LobHelper SessionImpl.getLobHelper()
